modName: Vlad your Big Brother Vampire Companion
summary: Adds Vlad, a nice guy vampire as a companion !
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/10d5eac.png[/IMG]

He is a Vampire,  a very dangerous one. 
But... He is such a nice guy !! He will always smile at you, be polite and nice to you, and still be an awesome fearless vampire ! ^^ 

Find him at lvl 20, raise him up in lvl with you till 81 
Location? Riverwood\'s Inn
Good at ? Any warrior type stuff. 
Wears a retextured personal clothes.

Requirements : Skyrim Last update

*Credits to CrimsonFairy for the aaaawesome pics ^^ !!! Thnx a looot !![url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/180057]CrimsonFairy pics[/url] 
*Fixed the issues from the anterior mod file !


[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/kq5ja.jpg[/IMG]
Better looking with that urshi\'s awesome mod :)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21772]High Res Male Vampire Face Textures[/url]
author: Scotaiel
